*div1 type="summary"* *p*H. Connell to Austin, Woodville, Miss., February 26, 1825. Emigration to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*Woodville*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-26-1825">26th Feby 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*On the return of *person_mentioned*Mr. Holliman*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* from your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* last fall they informed me that they had got your promise to reserve a League of land for me, on condition that I would agree to settle it etc—and*person_mentioned* Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* has also informed me a few days ago that he had received a letter from you in which you wished to know if It was my intention to take it, if not you would have to let some other person have it; I will now ask the favour of you still to retain the land for me, as I am determined to have it, and will start to your *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* for that purpose by the first of *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1825">June next*/date_mentioned* in company with *person_mentioned*Mr. Michael Holliman*/person_mentioned* who is going also with the same views, and expect there will be 2 or 3 other *person_mentioned*gentlemen*/person_mentioned* go with us*/p* *p* *person_mentioned*Mr. George Huff*/person_mentioned* has left here *date_mentioned n="02-20-1825">5 or six days ago*/date_mentioned* for *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned*, and from there by water to your *location_mentioned*neighbourhood*/location_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Mr. L. Ramey*/person_mentioned* left here *date_mentioned n="02-24-1825">2 days since*/date_mentioned*, who will meet with *person_mentioned*Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*New Orlenas*/location_mentioned* and go with him who you will find an honest man and an excellent *person_mentioned*Mecanic*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr K Holliman*/person_mentioned* has written to you by*person_mentioned* Mr. Ramey*/person_mentioned* the contents of which you will see*/p*
*p*I am sending this letter to *person_mentioned*Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned*, and the bearer *person_mentioned*Mr. Severson*/person_mentioned* is waiting on me, and have not time to say more at present—*/p*
*p*You will please accept my best wishes for your health and prosperity and the speedy settlement of your*location_mentioned* province*/location_mentioned* which is the sincere prayer of*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*H. Connell*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned*- pr*person_mentioned* Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* */p*
*/div1*
